contents.name: Details.txt
contents.description:
Quopt is a sleek and addictive word puzzle game where players unscramble iconic quotes by swapping letters within words. Designed for simplicity and elegance, it brings a fresh, modern twist to classic logic challenges.

Skills: React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Game Development

Click the Safari link in this folder to see the full live project!

contents.name: Details.txt
contents.description:
This real-time browser-based machine learning app uses your webcam to classify objects live. It's built for interactivity and showcases the power of client-side computer vision, with no back-end required.

Skills: React, TensorFlow.js, Machine Learning, Computer Vision

Click the Safari link in this folder to try it live!

contents.name: Details.txt
contents.description:
Built for Genisys App, a boutique consulting firm, this marketing site features modern branding, responsive design, and seamless user flows — all wrapped in a polished, professional aesthetic.

Skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Responsive Design

Click the Safari link in this folder to visit the live site!

contents.name: Details.txt
contents.description:
This site was created for USC’s Alpha Zeta business fraternity, highlighting its events, recruitment, and community. Designed with a clean visual style, it's optimized for showcasing student-led impact.

Skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Web Development

Click the Safari link in this folder to explore the site!

contents.name: Details.txt
contents.description:
MenuSC is a PWA designed for USC students to check dining hall menus in a modern, mobile-first format. It features allergen filters, upcoming meal previews, and offline access through a clean, Apple-style UI.

Skills: Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Firebase, Web Scraping, PWA

Click the Safari link in this folder to see it in action!
